CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, November 29, 1952, pg. 1 reads: "Happy Moments in Lives Of These "Favorite Churchwomen" - These five contestants shared honors last Thursday night in A. Leo Weil School Auditorium...A group of friends shower fourth prize winner, Mrs. Luella McTurner, right, in the third picture, with flowers and gifts. In that picture also are Mrs. Ernestine Townes, left; Dr. J.W. Storms and Mrs. Rachel Washington."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of P.L. Prattis, seated, Ernestine Townes, Dr. J.W. Storms, Rachel Washington, Luella McTurner, and Jessie Vann, gathered in A. Leo Weil school during "Favorite Churchwoman's" contest award program
